content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://upsa.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA (EPAM Utilization and Project Staffing Analyzer)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is an automated environment for performing a variety of tasks related to effective staff utilization, facilitating and systematizing the majority of people management business processes within the organization, advancing project team members' evaluation opportunities, storing tons of crucial data in one place and boosting reporting functionality. UPSA is closely integrated with PMC -- EPAM Project Management Center.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA makes it possible to view company statistics related to people management, as well as track all HR processes within the company.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Within the scope of UPSA's extended functionality, the following features exist:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Management of employee information (Skills, project involvement, job function)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project tracking and project planning, including project staffing and management of project positions\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Analysis and management of employee workloads \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Effective utilization of employees on the bench\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Extended search and filtering (the ability to search resources for a particular project) \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reporting (including different types of reports related to human resources activities)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In order for UPSA to allow the successful implementation of the processes mentioned above, it is critical that each employee completes their employee profile. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Instructions on how to complete your employee profile are provided in the next step.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"About Project Tracking in UPSA\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each project in EPAM has a project profile in UPSA. As a rule, the project manager populates and regularly updates the project profile. The profile contains information about the customer, key employees at EPAM associated with this customer (project sponsor, project supervisor, account manager, project manager, project coordinators, etc.), short descriptions of the project tasks, the technologies used and the necessary skills required for team members, a list of the project team and the project team's actual workload, and other information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here is an example of a project profile in UPSA.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/81e76f06-377e-4473-bd09-81019860f142/6.PNG\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1382,\"height\":762}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Help application within UPSA contains lots of useful information\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5d2cdcfb-7b94-402f-b47b-ce1a23539caf/7.png\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":268,\"height\":232}},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can also use \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/UPSA/Webinars+and+Tutorials\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UPSA Tutorials\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" available in EPAM Video Portal.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If you have any questions regarding this section, please seek assistance from your Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
